articles.description: Lauren James has become an overnight sensation but dad Nigel tells BBC Sport he is not surprised at her success for England at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: James 'not surprised' by daughter Lauren's impressive World Cup form

articles.description: The Saudi Pro League's "remarkable" spending spree on new players is set to continue, according to one of its leading executives.
articles.title: 'I don't see this slowing down' - Saudi spending to continue

articles.description: Sunil Narine whacked 13 off five balls at the death to give Oval Invincibles a three-wicket victory over London Spirit at Lord's.
articles.title: Narine's heroics help Invincibles beat Spirit

articles.description: Arsenal striker Gabriel Jesus has minor knee surgery and will miss the start of the new Premier League season.
articles.title: Jesus to miss start of season after knee surgery

articles.description: Manchester City agree a £77m deal with German club RB Leipzig for 21-year-old Croatia defender Josko Gvardiol.
articles.title: Man City agree £77m fee for Leipzig defender Gvardiol

articles.description: Test Match Special statistician Andy Zaltzman reveals how a £1 accumulator could have earned you £18 quadrillion. Maybe.
articles.title: The unexpected and quirky stats from a brilliant Ashes

articles.description: Watch South Africa score in the dying seconds to earn a dramatic 48-48 draw with New Zealand at the Netball World Cup.
articles.title: 'Wow!' South Africa score in last second to tie with NZ

articles.description: Former Italy goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon retires from professional football aged 45.
articles.title: Italy legend Buffon retires aged 45

articles.description: As Marta bows out at the group stage of her sixth and final World Cup, BBC Sport examines her legacy as one of women's football's greats.
articles.title: 'Marta ends here' - Brazil legend's World Cup exit

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu returns to the practice court for the first time since undergoing wrist and ankle surgery in May.
articles.title: Raducanu back on court for first time since surgery
